Question: This person was previewed at the 2006 Comic-Con International in San Diego, California, on July 21, 2006.
Hints: In New York, this person sees an episode of Baywatch on television and immediately falls in love with Pamela Anderson.
While Azamat advises a return to New York, this person attempts to buy a handgun to defend himself against Jews.
Afterwards, this person marries Luenell, and returns to Kazakhstan with her.
